hero.title: Turn Plastic Into Rewards
hero.description: Join thousands making a difference. Recycle plastic, earn rewards, and help build a sustainable future with Plastixide.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Simple, transparent, and rewarding. Get started in three easy steps.
howItWorks.step1Desc: Create your free account and find the nearest vending machine in your area.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Deposit your clean plastic items into the smart vending machine.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Get instant rewards you can redeem for discounts and prizes.

roles.description: Three distinct experiences designed for every participant in the circular economy.
roles.citizensDesc: Earn rewards by recycling plastic through our smart vending machines. Track your impact and redeem rewards.
roles.buyersDesc: Purchase collected, processed plastic directly from our marketplace with guaranteed quality.
roles.collectorsDesc: Manage your branch's collection centers, inventory, and payments through a comprehensive dashboard.
